name: Crush the World with the Mighty Fist!
text: At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Fire Hand" and 1 "Ice Hand" to your Deck, unless it already includes a copy of the respective card. Then, add 1 "Number 106: Giant Hand" to your Extra Deck. The following effect can be used if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Return 1 card from your hand to your Deck, and add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic Barian's Force" to your hand from outside of your Deck. This skill can only be used once per Duel.
